content:
tolstenko opened issue #6139:

Hi all, please pardon me if this is not the correct repo to report the issue. I found a small problem on the https://wasmtime.dev/ page in the language support section. The link is on the CMake link going to https://wasmtime.dev/crates/c-api/CMakeLists.txt but I suggest linking to this one https://docs.wasmtime.dev/c-api/ instead to avoid the broken link.

Hi all, please pardon me if this is not the correct repo to report the issue. I found a small problem on the https://wasmtime.dev/ page in the language support section. The link is on the CMake link going to https://wasmtime.dev/crates/c-api/CMakeLists.txt but I suggest linking to this one https://docs.wasmtime.dev/c-api/ instead to avoid the broken link.

jameysharp commented on issue #6139:

That site is maintained in the bytecodealliance/wasmtime.dev repo, but the link you're looking at is copied directly from README.md in this repo, and I think we should change both places. Would you like to open a PR for the README changes here first? Once that's merged we can apply the same change there.
